Usage: apic {{catalogs:transfer}} CATALOG_NAME USER_ID OPTIONS

  Transfer ownership of a catalog in an organization
  
  User IDs can be viewed using:
  {{ $ apic members:list --organization ORG --server SERVER }}

  Options
    -o, --{{organization}} ORGANIZATION     a specific provider organization (required)
    -s, --{{server}} SERVER                 management server endpoint (required)

  Stability: prototype

  Transfer ownership of the {{Production}} catalog to the user {{12345678}} in the {{climbonorg}} 
    organization on the {{mgmnthost.com}} server.
    {{$ apic catalogs:transfer Production 12345678 --organization climbonorg --server mgmnthost.com }}
